Package ru.clevertec.news.mapper

Interface NewsMapper

public interface NewsMapper
Mapper interface for converting between News entities and corresponding DTOs.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergey Leshkevich

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    News
    merge(News news, NewsRequest newsRequest)
    Merges data from NewsRequest DTO into an existing News entity.
    News
    toEntity(NewsRequest dto)
    Converts NewsRequest DTO to News entity.
    NewsResponse
    toViewModel(News news)
    Converts News entity to NewsResponse DTO.
    List<NewsResponse>
    toViewModelList(List<News> list)
    Converts a list of News entities to a list of NewsResponse DTOs.

  • Method Details

    • toViewModel

      NewsResponse toViewModel(News news)
      Converts News entity to NewsResponse DTO.
      Parameters:
      news - News entity to be converted.
      Returns:
      Corresponding NewsResponse DTO.

    • toEntity

      News toEntity(NewsRequest dto)
      Converts NewsRequest DTO to News entity.
      Parameters:
      dto - NewsRequest DTO to be converted.
      Returns:
      Corresponding News entity.

    • toViewModelList

      List<NewsResponse> toViewModelList(List<News> list)
      Converts a list of News entities to a list of NewsResponse DTOs.
      Parameters:
      list - List of News entities to be converted.
      Returns:
      List of corresponding NewsResponse DTOs.

    • merge

      News merge(News news, NewsRequest newsRequest)
      Merges data from NewsRequest DTO into an existing News entity.
      Parameters:
      news - Existing News entity to be updated.
      newsRequest - NewsRequest DTO containing updated data.
      Returns:
      Updated News entity.
